title: A letter to Mr. Thevenot containing a censure of Mr. Le Grand's History of King Henry the Eighth's divorce : to which is added, a censure of Mr. de Meaux's History of the variations of the Protestant churches : together with some further reflections on Mr. Le Grand / both written by Gilbert Burnet ...
author: Burnet, Gilbert, 1643-1715.
publisher: Printed for John Starkey and Richard Chiswell,
